title: Fifteen Barclays Bank Cartoons
brief_description: A collection of the famous series of humorous advertising cartoons made for Barclays Bank over years. These are designed to ‘sell’ money management to potential customers. The cartoons cover cheque accounts, savings accounts, standing orders and statements.
